messages.subject: socialization quotes
messages.msgSnippet: Will dumped out my file box again today and instead of spending hours refiling I am slinging a lot of this stuff.  I found these notes, and since I saw a
messages.messageBody:
Will dumped out my file box again today and instead of spending hours refiling I am slinging a lot of this stuff. I found these notes, and since I saw a request for submissions of socialization articles come through here not long ago, I thought I'd send them along in case anyone can use them:

"The world of education is like an island where people, cut off from the world, are prepared for life by exclusion from it."
Maria Montessori in The Absorbant Mind, p 11

"The family is always...a school of human relations in which children learn to live within a society."
David Elkind in The Hurried Child, p 120

FWIW!
Millie
